column4: That was lame.going to login,i tried options and it gave me a few options,the closest thing to the raw terminal was failsafe terminal which was just emulation and it said stop xserver
so how do i drop X so i can get back to the DOS
uh, any filter that gives the impression of a "crisper" sound or such will, by definition, be altering the audio, and therefore make it *worse* for any good input
